actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to provide for the Commissioner of Labor Statistics to be classified as Executive Level IV, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Labor Executive Level Conforming Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Department of Labor Executive Level Conforming Amendments of 1991 - Reclassifies the Commissioner of Labor Statistics position at level IV of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: Department of Labor Executive Level Conforming Amendments of 1991
A bill to provide for the Commissioner of Labor Statistics to be classified as Executive Level IV, and for other purposes.
